pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, April 6, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
All times local.

Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Friday, April 6, 2018:

Fort McMurray, Alberta

12 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with employees of Suncorâ€™s Fort Hills facility.

Suncor Fort Hills

Notes for media:

  • Arrival no later than 10am via Gate 9 Fort Hills (visitors center)
  • Photo opportunity of visit 
  • Media must rsvp: media@suncor.com
  • Media must wear long sleeves, long pants and closed toe shoes 
  • Media will be escorted from the visitor center to the event site by bus 

1 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Suncor Fort Hills  

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

2:55 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a roundtable with energy sector leaders.

Woodbridge Room
Radisson Fort McMurray

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the end of the meeting
  • Media must arrive no later than 3:20 p.m.

4:20 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with leaders from local First Nations and Metis communities.

Woodbridge Room
Radisson Fort McMurray

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the roundtable
  • Media must arrive no later than 4pm
